name: TENET SHOOTER
description:
I make this game for Game Jam Title is "Game Jam Couldn't Game Jam'.

This is the hardest game. First time you must movement in reverse time, and you must find timer change to change from reverse time to be real time.

Destroy all Clock because this is your mission to go to next level. Watchout about enemy, they are so smart. You must hide and seek and waiting when you go.

Try this and make you to be frustation.

sorry my bad Tutorial, i not have more time.

Tutorial:

next time i will update this game make good tutorial

On this game i hope i can more develop this game, and hope more make 3D FPS Online for this game.
